# Infrastructure Change Approval Request

**Operation Type:** `azure_subnet_creation`
**Request ID:** `671491ce`
**Requested By:** admin
**Created:** 2026-02-23T17:44:26.739876

## Summary
Can you create 2 new subnets in the InfraOps-Vnet with subnets 10.10.0.0/24 name Staff and 10.10.1.0/24 Infra-subnet

## Terraform Code

```hcl
# Azure Subnets Configuration
# Generated by MCP Infrastructure Orchestrator
# Request ID: 671491ce

terraform {
  required_providers {
    azurerm = {
      source  = "hashicorp/azurerm"
      version = "~> 3.0"
    }
  }
}

provider "azurerm" {
  features {}
}

# Create or reference Resource Group
resource "azurerm_resource_group" "rg" {
  name     = "InfraOps-RG"
  location = "eastus"

  lifecycle {
    ignore_changes = [tags]
  }

  tags = {
    created_by = "mcp-infrastructure"
    request_id = "671491ce"
  }
}

# Create or reference Virtual Network
resource "azurerm_virtual_network" "vnet" {
  name                = "InfraOps-Vnet"
  address_space       = ["10.10.0.0/16"]
  location            = azurerm_resource_group.rg.location
  resource_group_name = azurerm_resource_group.rg.name

  lifecycle {
    ignore_changes = [tags]
  }

  tags = {
    request_id = "671491ce"
  }
}

# Subnets in Virtual Network: InfraOps-Vnet
# Resource Group: InfraOps-RG

resource "azurerm_subnet" "staff" {
  name                 = "Staff"
  resource_group_name  = azurerm_resource_group.rg.name
  virtual_network_name = azurerm_virtual_network.vnet.name
  address_prefixes     = ["10.10.0.0/24"]
}

resource "azurerm_subnet" "infra_subnet" {
  name                 = "Infra-subnet"
  resource_group_name  = azurerm_resource_group.rg.name
  virtual_network_name = azurerm_virtual_network.vnet.name
  address_prefixes     = ["10.10.1.0/24"]
}


# Outputs
output "subnet_staff_id" {
  description = "The ID of subnet Staff"
  value       = azurerm_subnet.staff.id
}

output "subnet_infra_subnet_id" {
  description = "The ID of subnet Infra-subnet"
  value       = azurerm_subnet.infra_subnet.id
}


```

## Parameters

```json
  "virtual_network_name": "InfraOps-Vnet",
  "resource_group": "InfraOps-RG",
  "subnet_count": "2",
  "subnets": "Staff, Infra-subnet"
```
